> [109389839](#comment_10_1J5eDu2ErJf5hq2rc52AvLR6QqK4723uj7): "(please correct me if I get it wrong)", "Combining zeronet and ipfs seems to be a good idea."   maybe.. but combining zeronet and qbittorrent or even plain utorrent, if you may, would be even better. BitTorrent with web seeders are more permanent than ipfs, such web seeders can be hosted by nextcloud, or even zeronet or freenet (if it's running). Before a post is high profile enough to attract attention for censorship to web seeders, it likely will be popular enough for several peer seeders to back em liberty up

> [109389839](#comment_13_1J5eDu2ErJf5hq2rc52AvLR6QqK4723uj7): Zeronet may be the most fun darknet, and great for small files, but let's face it, it doesn't handle large files like videos well. I dare you! [...]

> [953gwpudtmsxjq4a](#comment_23_1F7Ks3WsZieUtEYgNjZXrhxxLkvgJ1EQtp): I'm trying to seed almost everything. You should too. All of us need to get past this idea that "someone else will do it".
